name: reward_program_template
description: Stamped Loyalty style template with purple background, central image, CTA, and people tags

fieldPrompt.logo_url: Upload your business logo with transparent background (PNG format). The logo should be clear, high-resolution, and easily recognizable at different sizes. Ensure it represents your brand identity effectively and builds trust with customers.
fieldPrompt.heading: Create a catchy, exciting name for your loyalty program (max 20 characters) that will motivate customers to participate. Examples: Elite Rewards, Gold Member Club, VIP Program, Loyalty Plus. Use words that convey exclusivity and value.
fieldPrompt.points: Enter the number of points being awarded or required for redemption (max 10 characters). Examples: 250, 1,000, 5,000. Make it clear and easy to understand. Consider using commas for larger numbers (e.g., 1,000).
fieldPrompt.theme_color: Select a hex color code (4-7 characters) that matches your brand identity and creates excitement for the loyalty program. Examples: #795548 for brown, #FFD700 for gold, #C0C0C0 for silver. Choose colors that convey premium value and exclusivity.
fieldPrompt.cta_text: Create a clear, action-oriented call-to-action (max 20 characters) that encourages customers to engage with your loyalty program. Examples: Join Now, Redeem Points, Earn More, Start Earning. Make it compelling and easy to understand.
